mapper.insert: insert into youtube_content(title, channel_name, channel_id, video_id, view_count, like_count, dislike_count, published_time, comments, user_id, percent, keywords) values (#{param.title}, #{param.channel_name} , #{param.channel_id}, #{param.video_id}, #{param.view_count}, #{param.like_Count}, #{param.dislike_count}, #{param.published_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{param.comments}, #{param.user_id}, #{param.percent}, #{param.keywords});
mapper.update: update youtube_content set percent=#{param.percent}, keywords=#{param.keywords} where video_id = #{param.video_id}
mapper.select: select title as title, channel_name as channel_name, channel_id as channel_id, video_id as video_id, view_count as view_count, like_count as like_count, dislike_count as dislike_count, published_time as published_time, percent as percent, keywords as keywords, user_id as user_id from youtube_content where user_id = #{userId} order by published_time desc limit #{limit} offset #{offset};
